price: Şunu söyle: Eğer yeryüzünde yerleşmiş gezip dolaşan melekler olsaydı, elbette onlara gökten, peygamber olarak bir melek gönderirdik.
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَلَٰٓئِكَةٞ يَمۡشُونَ مُطۡمَئِنِّينَ لَنَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَلَكٗا رَّسُولٗا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul law kāna fī al-arḍi malāikatun yamshūna muṭ'ma-innīna lanazzalnā ʿalayhim mina al-samāi malakan rasūlan
